Part A:
int_0^1 ln(x)/sqrt(x) dx = -3.99999969851602
int_-inf^inf exp(-x^2) dx = 1.77245411516459 = sqrt(pi) = 1.77245385090552
int_0^1 ln(1/x)^p = result = Gamma(p+1)
p = 0 : 1 = Gamma(p+1) = 0.999988172294371
p = 1 : 1.00000301938785 = Gamma(p+1) = 1.00000017918096
p = 2 : 2.0000023300811 = Gamma(p+1) = 2.00000035836193
p = 3 : 6.00000121699292 = Gamma(p+1) = 6.00000107508579
p = 4 : 24.000000987935 = Gamma(p+1) = 24.0000043003432
p = 5 : 119.999998692763 = Gamma(p+1) = 120.000021501716
p = 6 : 719.999845102079 = Gamma(p+1) = 720.000129010295
p = 7 : 5039.99897942109 = Gamma(p+1) = 5040.00090307206
p = 8 : 40319.9923250333 = Gamma(p+1) = 40320.0072245765


Part B:
int_0^inf x^3/(exp(x)-1) = 6.49393737654557 = pi^4/15 = 6.49393940226683
Gaussian integral int_0^inf e^(-ax^2):
a = 0.5 :  	1.25330948679535 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 1.2533141373155
a = 1 :  	0.886227057582295 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.886226925452758
a = 1.5 :  	0.723602138653839 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.723601254558268
a = 2 :  	0.626656840747463 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.62665706865775
a = 2.5 :  	0.560498810401429 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.560499121639793
a = 3 :  	0.511662691381082 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.511663353973244
a = 3.5 :  	0.473705213571296 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.473708217425467
a = 4 :  	0.44311227793239 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.443113462726379
a = 4.5 :  	0.417770202938905 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.417771379105167
a = 5 :  	0.396332638397029 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.396332729760601
a = 5.5 :  	0.377888463280638 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.377888430720316
a = 6 :  	0.361800587147981 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.361800627279134
a = 6.5 :  	0.347518147803398 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.347606798950381
a = 7 :  	0.334909205890803 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.334962292845339
a = 7.5 :  	0.323572437373363 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.323604318759283
a = 8 :  	0.313311548708175 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.313328534328875
a = 8.5 :  	0.303962696802102 = 1/2*sqrt(pi/a) = 0.303973327660687

Part C:
The lowest energy E is E_min=0.499998507630578 at a_min=1
